full_description:
Lexar NS100 128GB 2.5 inch Gray SATA III SSD

The Lexar NS100 SSD features a 2.5' SATA III (6Gb/s) interface. It gives you faster boot-ups, application load times, and data transfers turning your old computer from dinosaur to dynamo with a read speed of up to 550MB/s. It also uses less battery life than a traditional hard disk drive. The NS100 SSD gets rid of the performance of your computer anxiety from having an old traditional hard drive and allows it to take center stage with more speed and storage space than ever had before. Unlike traditional hard disk drives, the NS100 SSD has no moving parts, so it's more durable and less likely to fail. Add to that, it's shock and vibration resistant and you've got one robust and reliable SSD to safely store and render your large-sized data, photos, and 4K videos. All Lexar product designs undergo extensive testing in the Lexar Quality Labs, facilities with more than 1,100 digital devices, to ensure performance, quality, compatibility, and reliability. The Lexar NS100 comes with 3 years of warranty.

values.value: Shock Resistant: 1500G, duration 0.5ms, Half Sine Wave

Lexar NM620 256GB M.2 NVMe SSD

Lexar NM620 SSD comes with 256GB capacity, High-speed PCIe Gen3x4 interface, M.2 2280 Form Factor and NAND flash 3D TLC flash. The SSD focuses on providing higher performance for power users with heavy workloads and those who work and play on the same machine. The Lexar NM620 256GB SSD offers up to 3000MB/s read speeds and 1300MB/s writes. This SSD has Low-Density Parity-Check for catching and fixing data errors on the fly with minimal impact to performance.
